content: I hate to admit it, cos I’m more handsome than you, but one of your vids inspired me. Inspire is a strong word. It didn’t “Fill [me] with revolutionary ideas”, as the dictionary suggests. It kicked me in the arse. More like nudged me forward. No kicking. OK, it was a wallop to the noggin. It was the one where you say a person shouldn’t quit after only six months. One should keep going. I’m following your advice. Thanks GeeVee!
